title: Shahr-e Sukhteh
description: A Bronze Age urban settlement, associated with the Jiroft culture, located in Sistan and Baluchistan provinces in the southeastern part of Iran. The site was added to the UNESCO World Heritage List in 2014.

properties.description: Representative centroid location of Šahr-i Sūkhta from Cuneiform Inscriptions Geographical Site Index (CIGS) .
properties.title: CIGS location of Šahr-i Sūkhta
